PageRevealEvent.summary: The PageRevealEvent event object is made available inside handler functions for the event.

remarks.para: During a cross-document navigation, it allows you to manipulate a related view transition (providing access to the relevant object) from the document being navigated to, if a view transition was triggered by the navigation.

Outside view transitions, this event is also useful for cases such as triggering a startup animation, or reporting a page view. It's equivalent to the first run after a cross-document navigation, if you were to trigger requestAnimationFrame() in the head of the document.
